context: Spotify Technology S.A. is a audio streaming platform focused on music streaming, podcasts, and audiobooks. Apple Music competition began. Podcast investment.

competitors.name: Apple Music
competitors.notes: Launched 2015, leveraged Apple ecosystem, no free tier

competitors.name: Tidal
competitors.notes: Jay-Z owned, artist-focused with lossless audio quality

competitors.name: Pandora
competitors.notes: Internet radio pioneer, acquired Rdio assets
